messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/15/2003 6:27:14 PM Eastern Standard Time,
grlynbl@... writes:


> > The only one I remember with brothers and a tiger was Pat Conroy's Beach
> > Music.
> >
>
> No, but Landon just read that one. A friend recommended it to him and he
> LOVED it.. He is on to me to read it ASAP. He said his friend said it was
> about "everything" When Landon read it, he said.. DAG!, it IS about
> everything... lol. I can't wait to read it
>
>

It's one of those great books that goes down many, many side-story rabbit
trails....stories within stories....feels like it will never end (and that's
a good thing with this book!!)

Nancy

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom]  - Books
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/15/2003 6:03:36 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... Speaking of Pat Conroy, his The Water is Wide later made into the movie Conrack is a
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/15/2003 6:03:36 PM Eastern Standard Time,
kbcdlovejo@... writes:


> The only one I remember with brothers and a tiger was Pat Conroy's Beach
> Music.
>
>

Speaking of Pat Conroy, his "The Water is Wide" later made into the movie
"Conrack" is a great homeschooling movie, I would say. Shows a teacher
trying to go in and change the system, teach kids using alternative methods,
then being thrown out because he doesn't fit in their mold. Loved both of
them. (BIG Pat Conroy Fan!!)
Nancy


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

In a message dated 5/15/03 6:03:54 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
kbcdlovejo@... writes:

> The only one I remember with brothers and a tiger was Pat Conroy's Beach
> Music.

No, but Landon just read that one. A friend recommended it to him and he
LOVED it.. He is on to me to read it ASAP. He said his friend said it was
about "everything" When Landon read it, he said.. DAG!, it IS about
everything... lol. I can't wait to read it

Teresa
